hadiths.text: Sufyan narrated from Ibn Juraij, from 'Ata', from Jabir that the Messenger of Allah said:"Do not give things on the basis of Ruqba or 'Umra. Whoever is given something on the basis of Ruqba or 'Umra, it belongs to his heirs

chapter.ara-name: باب ذِكْرِ اخْتِلاَفِ أَلْفَاظِ النَّاقِلِينَ لِخَبَرِ جَابِرٍ فِي الْعُمْرَى
chapter.eng-name: Mentioning The Different Versions Of The Report Of Jabir Concerning 'Umra
